channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: We Asked AI to Take Us On a Tour of Our Cities. It Was Chaos
item.description: We had a specialty chatbot to curate perfect days out in London and New York for under $100 each. We're still recovering from our journeys.

item.title: CrowdStrike update causes major IT outage, taking out banks, airlines and businesses across the world

item.title: Huge Microsoft Outage Linked to CrowdStrike Takes Down Computers Around the World
item.description: A software update from cybersecurity company CrowdStrike appears to have inadvertently disrupted IT systems globally.

item.title: Paytm loss widens and revenue shrinks as it grapples with regulatory clampdown

item.title: The 31 Best Movies on Hulu This Week (July 2024)
item.description: Ferrari, Perfect Days, and Get Out are just a few of the movies you need to watch on Hulu right now.
